news-item.title: NTN drops to eight-month low
news-item.text:
NTN Corporation (TO:6472), the 23rd largest machinery/industrial goods company by market capitalisation in the Tokyo Stock Exchange, traded at its 217-day low of JPY350.0. The stock fell for a fourth consecutive day on Monday bringing its four-day fall to JPY37.0 or 9.5%. The stock price decreased JPY3.0 (or 0.8%) to close at JPY354.0. Compared with the Nikkei 225 Index which fell 50.0 points (or 0.4%) in the day, this represented a relative price change of -0.5%. The volume was 0.7 times the average trading of 6.6 million shares. To download our Detailed Research Report (PDF), giving comprehensive trading and background information on NTN, please click http://www.buysellsignals.com/0010517117703142182 Bearish SignalsDowntrend- The stock decreased on weak volume falling for a fourth consecutive day.- The Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) indicator of 12-day Exponential Moving Average (EMA) of 375.92 minus the 26-day EMA of 389.2 is negative 13.28 suggesting a bearish signal. Both EMA prices are falling, another bearish signal.- The price tumbled 9.0% in the last week and 6.1% in the last month. - Compared with the Nikkei 225 Index which fell 5.6% for the week and 0.8% for the month, this represented a relative price decrease for NTN stock of 3.4% for the week and 5.3% for the month. NoteVolume: there were 4,386,000 shares worth JPY1.6 billion (US$15.4 million) traded. Beta: the Beta of NTN stock is 1.6. A Beta greater than 1 suggests this is a high risk, high return stock with volatility greater than that of the market. - NTN is at a discount of 34.1% to its 12-month high of JPY537.0 on 16 Jan, 2014. It is also at a premium of 62.4% to the 12-month low of JPY218.0 on 04 Apr, 2013. - The present value of JPY1,000 (PV1000) invested one year ago in NTN is JPY1,383, for a capital gain of JPY383. Bullish Signals:Oversold/Bullish/Support Signals- At JPY354.0 the price is below the lower Bollinger band support of JPY358.58, indicating an upside for it to return to the band. - The stock is oversold according to the Williams % R indicator of -91.5, suggesting the price is close to its 14-day low of JPY350.0.Fundamental measures by comparison with the sector average [in brackets] indicate Undervaluation:- Price/Sales of 0.3 [2.3]. We estimate NTN stock is trading at a current year Price/Sales of 0.3 and a forward year Price/Sales of 0.3. - Price to Book of 0.9 [4.1].Other Bullish Signals:- The company is cash rich with Cash to Market Capitalisation at 28.0%. - Tobin's Q Ratio, defined as MCap divided by Total Assets, is 0.2. Compared with the rest of the market the stock is undervalued and ranks in the top quartile of stock by value of Q Ratio.- Revenue growth has shown signs of recovery in recent quarters.[Quarter ended, all figures in %] - Return on Capital Employed is negative but improving in recent years.[Year ended, all figures in %]
